attributes.action: consider scientific evidence that air travel should not be blamed as a major contributor to carbon emissions and that taxes on air travel should be capped and not increased any further.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: I feel this petition would highlight that a balance needs to be struck between reducing  emissions and not allowing air travel to become restricted. I believe air travel benefits many people around the world, not just passengers.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
